thread.title: It's ME for me!
thread.title_full: It's ME for me! - Review of ME London, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: agoodley
title: It's ME for me!
text:
I stay here each time I'm in London and am generally very happy with the location, service and staff. Elonora deserves a special shout out as she always goes out of her way to make my stay special.
PROS
- Quirky rooms, interesting lobby, mood lighting, nice toiletries, good location (near covert garden/theatre district)
CONS
- The grumpy guy that mans the reception in the night shift. He is so grumpy!
- loud rooftop bar (I would avoid rooms on the 8th floor)
